Gaussian_Nonlinear_Model Class Reference

Gaussian Nonlinear Model The state : X(k) = F (Xk-1, Wk) The Observation Y(k) = H (X(k)) + V. More...

#include <gaussian_model.h>

Detailed Description

Gaussian Nonlinear Model The state : X(k) = F (Xk-1, Wk) The Observation Y(k) = H (X(k)) + V.
